statements: SELECT * FROM patient_feedback;
SELECT patient_id FROM patient_feedback;
SELECT treatment_date, feedback FROM patient_feedback;
SELECT * FROM patient_feedback WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM patient_feedback ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_feedback WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT feedback FROM patient_feedback WHERE treatment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id FROM patient_feedback WHERE feedback LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT feedback, treatment_date FROM patient_feedback WHERE treatment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS feedback_count FROM patient_feedback GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY feedback_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_feedback;
SELECT patient_id, feedback FROM patient_feedback WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT feedback, patient_id FROM patient_feedback WHERE feedback LIKE '%good%';
SELECT * FROM stem_cell_treatments ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;
SELECT treatment_id, outcome FROM stem_cell_treatments WHERE patient_id = 5 ORDER BY outcome ASC;

SELECT feedback FROM patient_feedback WHERE patient_id = 2;
SELECT patient_id, feedback FROM patient_feedback WHERE feedback LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT * FROM stem_cell_treatments WHERE treatment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, treatment_date, outcome FROM stem_cell_treatments WHERE outcome = 'Successful' ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_feedback;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_outcome FROM patient_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_type FROM stem_cell_treatments ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM patient_info WHERE patient_age >= 50;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_date, treatment_type FROM stem_cell_treatments WHERE treatment_location = 'Hospital A';
SELECT * FROM patient_feedback ORDER BY treatment_date DESC, patient_name;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_outcome FROM patient_feedback WHERE treatment_outcome='Successful';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM patient_info WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT * FROM stem_cell_treatments WHERE treatment_location LIKE '%Hospital%' AND treatment_type='Cell Regeneration';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients, AVG(patient_age) AS average_age FROM patient_info;
SELECT * FROM patient_feedback;
SELECT patient_id, feedback_text FROM patient_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT treatment_id, treatment_type, treatment_cost FROM stem_cell_treatments WHERE treatment_cost < 5000;
SELECT outcome_id, outcome_date, outcome_description FROM treatment_outcomes ORDER BY outcome_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_feedback ORDER BY treatment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_date FROM patient_feedback WHERE patient_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 50 AND patient_gender = 'female';
SELECT p.patient_name, t.treatment_type, o.outcome_description FROM patients p JOIN stem_cell_treatments t ON p.patient_id = t.treatment_id JOIN treatment_outcomes o ON p.patient_id = o.patient_id;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id FROM treatment_outcomes WHERE outcome_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';

SELECT patient_id, treatment_date FROM patient_feedback ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(rating_value) AS max_rating FROM feedback_ratings;
